actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials
Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to give priority consideration for certain Department of Transportation grant programs to eligible projects that improve or build resiliency in the supply chain, and for other purposes.

summary.text: This bill directs the Department of Transportation to prioritize providing grants under certain programs for projects that improve or build resiliency in the supply chain, including multimodal projects.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to give priority consideration for certain Department of Transportation grant programs to eligible projects that improve or build resiliency in the supply chain, and for other purposes.
